casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Lonnie Bernard DAVIS 382P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 1, 2018 Lonnie Bernard Davis, Lufkin, TX, for Davis, Lonnie Bernard. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th of December 2017 by Defendant for Notice of Appeal of Court of Appeals Order dated 20 November 2017:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of March 2018."
